literature.title: Gamification in Education Learners Choice of Game Design Elements for Increased Learning Motivation (Manuscript)
literature.author: Maraquardt
literature.paperType: Ranking of Game Elements (1 Best. 10 Worst). with age groups: <20. 20-26. >26 artificially extended.

literature.title: Investigation of the Persuasiveness of Social Influence in Persuasive Technology and the Effect of Age and Gender
literature.author: Oyibo
literature.paperType: Mean scores of social influence strategies and group difference significance test (the bold values indicate significant difference between two groups); young = age 18-24. old = age >24; artificially extended to the age groups of the recommender.

literature.title: Using Gamification to Enhance User Motivation: The Influence of Gender and Age
literature.author: Jent
literature.paperType: Eigene Zusammenrechnung basierend  auf der Tabelle des Papers (Je niedriger der Wert. desto beliebter; very motivated bis not motivated eingeteilt wie schulnoten); Groups 20-29.30-39.40-49.50-64 artificially adapted.
